name: marmoreal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
made of or looking similar to marble (= a type of very hard rock with a pattern of lines through it that can be polished to become smooth and shiny ): The marmoreal splendour of the Glasgow City Chambers was a fine setting for the lecture. In some photographs taken near the end of his life, he looks marmoreal - a statue of himself.
too serious and lacking in movement, energy, or enthusiasm: She seems pulsingly alive in a way that the grand, marmoreal singers sometimes did not. As an actor, he's always been wooden, but here he's marmoreal.
